meanings.definition: A wheel that is operated by hand to control the movement of a machine or device.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic turned the handwheels to adjust the speed of the conveyor belt.
meanings.sent2: She gripped the handwheels tightly to steer the small boat through the narrow canal.
meanings.sent3: In the game, the character's special power was to control time by spinning the handwheels.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a set of intricate handwheels, each one controlling a different aspect of his emotions.
meanings.sent5: The handwheels hummed softly as they smoothly regulated the flow of water in the irrigation system.
